Package game

Class NPC

java.lang.Object
game.NPC
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public abstract class NPC extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class for creating interactive NPCs. Define a new NPC by extending this class and overriding relevant methods.
See Also:

      public static final long serialVersionUID
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • NPC

      public NPC(String label, String name)
      Creates a new NPC object with the given description label and NPC name. A description with the given label must already exist in the Game's map of NPC descriptions.
      Parameters:
      label - description label
      name - item name

    • NPC

      public NPC(String name)
      Creates a new NPC with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - NPC name

  • Method Details

    • setDesc

      public void setDesc(String label)
      Updates this NPC's description to the description with the given label. The given label must already exist in the Game's map of NPS descriptions.
      Parameters:
      label - description label

    • setDesc

      public void setDesc(String label, String desc)
      Adds a new description with the given label to the Game's map of NPC descriptions and updates this NPC's description label.
      Parameters:
      label - description label
      desc - NPC description

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns this NPC's name.
      Returns:
      NPC's name

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Updates this NPC's name to the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - NPC's new name

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()
      Returns this NPC's current health.
      Returns:
      NPC's health

    • setHealth

      public void setHealth(int health)
      Updates this NPC's health to the given value.
      Parameters:
      health - new value for NPC's health

    • reduceHealth

      public boolean reduceHealth(int thisMuch)
      Lowers this NPC's health by the given value.
      Parameters:
      thisMuch - amount to reduce health by
      Returns:
      true if NPC's health remains above zero

    • addHealth

      public void addHealth(int thisMuch)
      Increases this NPC's health by the given value.
      Parameters:
      thisMuch - amount to increase health by

    • roll

      public int roll(int sides)

    • say

      public void say(String s)
      Displays dialog for this NPC.
      Parameters:
      s - NPC dialog

    • response

      public void response(int choice)
      This method allows NPC to respond to a dialog choice made by the player.
      Parameters:
      choice - player's dialog choice.

    • getResponse

      public void getResponse(String[] options)
      Displays the given dialog choices to the player and allows the player to respond.
      Parameters:
      options - array of dialog choices to display to player

    • talk

      public void talk()
      Displays a generic message when player tries to talk to this NPC. Extending classes should override this method if the player can talk to the NPC.

    • attack

      public void attack()
      This method allows the player to try to attack this NPC with the player's equipped weapon.

    • attack

      public void attack(String weaponName)
      Displays a generic message when the player tries to attack this NPC. Extending classes should override this method if the player can attack the NPC.
      Parameters:
      weaponName - name of weapon player is attacking with

    • look

      public void look()
      Displays the description of this NPC.

    • give

      public void give(String itemName)
      Displays a generic message when the player tries to give an item to this NPC. Extending classes should override this method if the player can give an item to the NPC.
      Parameters:
      itemName - name of item player is trying to give

    • uniqueCommand

      public void uniqueCommand(String command)
      Responds to a command unique to this NPC if such a command exists. Extending classes should override this method if the NPC should respond to a unique command.
      Parameters:
      command - command issued by player
